abstract: More than 80 independent oil and gas producers have sued units of Goldman Sachs and BP, alleging they conspired with SemGroup to defraud the plaintiffs of money owed for oil and gas delivered prior to the energy trader’s 2008 bankruptcy, Reuters reported.

lead_paragraph: More than 80 independent oil and gas producers have sued units of Goldman Sachs and BP, alleging they conspired with SemGroup to defraud the plaintiffs of money owed for oil and gas delivered prior to the energy trader’s 2008 bankruptcy, Reuters reported.

headline.main: Misery Has Company: Goldman and BP Sued Together
